adDetails: Our studio specializes in providing event photography for corporations, non-profits and private individuals within the San Francisco Bay Area. Event Photography for: • Conferences • Trade Shows • Product Launches • Holiday Parties • Galas • Grand Openings • Fund Raisers • Anniversaries • Team Building Events • Employee Retreats Some of our recent Event Photography Clients Include: • AICP -- Association of Independent Commercial Producers • Green Festival • Quartz New Outlet • Real Estate Forum Magazine/ALM Real Estate Media Group • Environmental Defense Fund • Student Conservation Association • Gendex Dental Imaging • Dexis Digital Radiography • Hanson Bridget, LLP • Burberry • Duncan Channon Advertising & Design • University of California -- Berkeley • Tioga Energy • David Brower Center We'd love to photograph your next event. Just send us an inquiry with the date, time, and place and we'll be happy to put together a quote!
